document.full_text: the leader of chechnya's islamist insurgency said he is alive and well after russian forces said they may have killed him and he hinted he would prove it by organizing more attacks, radio free europe said.
document.title: russian insurgent leader hints at more attacks
lines_and_colors: the leader of chechnya's islamist insurgency said he is alive and well after russian forces said they may have killed him and he hinted he would prove it by organizing more attacks, radio free europe said.
